text: The Leader was a weekly newspaper in Melbourne, Victoria. It was a "companion weekly" to the daily newspaper The Age, and was edited by David Syme's brother George Syme. ==Digitization== The National Library of Australia has digitized photographic copies of most issues of The Leader from Vol X, No. 314 of 4 January 1862 to No. 3,285 of 28 December 1918 that may be accessed via Trove. == References == == External links == * Category:Defunct newspapers published in Melbourne Category:Publications established in 1852 Category:1852 establishments in Australia Category:Weekly newspapers published in Australia
title: The Leader (Melbourne)
